analysis: The project currently lacks a cohesive UI theme related to black holes. The existing files are incomplete and do not reflect the requested theme of 'blackholes' with animated objects, slides, and pages. The CSS and HTML files need to be updated to include cosmic and dark themes, animations for black hole visuals, and interactive elements.

improvements.description: Update the CSS file to include a dark, cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Add Egyptian-themed color palette and UI elements as described in the intent.

Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes. Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.

Update the JavaScript file to ensure all buttons have proper event handlers and functionality. Implement smooth transitions and user-friendly interactions for the mobile menu toggle and other interactive elements.
